name: Carter Story / 卡特冒险
description:
In a quiet medieval village, you suddenly receive a warning from your mentor:
Soon, everything here will be destroyed,
To change the language of this disaster,
You pick up the weapon in hand, solemn and stirring forward...


Game system Overview:
* It's a RogueLike gameplay combined with action adventure
* A rich variety of attack moves that can be used alternately in battle to defeat different combinations of enemies.
* Multiple layers of defense to block and counter the enemy.
* Different effects of equipment appear randomly, enrich your fantasy adventure.
* Increase your character's strange abilities by learning skills.
* Lots of weapon skills and special effects
* Random events lead to choices, and each choice will determine your future path.
